title: Anime Vol.1 SFX Pack
description: From laser beams to cartoony bird calls, upwelling whistles to stuttering magic spells in 105 24bit/96khz WAV files. With Anime SFX Pack you can meet every need from video games to animation projects.
longDescription:
From laser beams to cartoony bird calls, upwelling whistles to stuttering magic spells in 105 16bit/48khz WAV files. With Anime SFX Pack you can meet every need from video games to animation projects.


Inspired by classic Japanese anime, Anime gives you access to transitions, animals, arcade whooshes, fight, magic, cartoony, water, whistle sound effects that you need for your related projects and also lots of room for further sound design with the flexible texture of the sounds for customization. We paid attention to richness of layers in each sound using powerful organic sounds and many synthesizers.


This is a rare SFX pack that has sounds of numerous actions with easy to navigate naming. It is a thoroughly researched collection capturing the core of Anime sound effects, with high resolution sound effects, prepared in collaboration with anime art collectors.


Keywords including Actions, Parts, Equipment and Style


Anime design transition whistle whoosh wind impact motion animal arcade fight magic cartoon water air riser hit power metallic whistle classic laser noise eagle bird beam echo glitchy stutter underwater ringing aggressive teleport game animation movie film
